help: **-ft map** - View a map of available timezones.
**-ft set <timezone>** - Set yourself to a timezone.
**-ft invite** - Invite Friend Time to your server.
map: Please visit the following link and choose your timezone:
Then enter **-ft set <timezone>** with your timezone.
**Note**: Use a timezone in the format **<region>/<city>**. For example: *America/New_York*. Timezone abbreviations like *EST* or *GMT* will not work.
msg.notAllowedInDm: This command doesn't work in direct messages. Try again in a server channel.
noTimezoneProvided: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
invalidTimezone: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
invite: Please visit the following link to invite Friend Time to your Discord server:
timezoneNotSet: Hi {USERNAME}, it looks like you don't have a timezone set yet.
Please type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
Then type **-ft set <timezone>** to set yourself to that timezone.

log.clientError: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client WebSocket encountered a connection error.
log.dblServerCountPosted: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] Server count posted to Discord Bot List!
log.dblError: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] An error occured with Discord Bot List.
log.loginFailed: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] Login failed. Please check that you've placed the correct Discord bot token in the config file.
log.userSetTimezone: User '{USERNAME}' ({USER_ID}) set their timezone to '{TIMEZONE}' in '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}).
